1:
Everyone in the world should shout joyfully to Yahweh!
\q2
2:
We should worship Yahweh gladly!
\q2 We should come before him singing joyful songs.
\q1
4:
Enter the gates of his temple thanking him;
\q2 enter the courtyard of the temple singing songs to praise him!
\q1 Thank him and praise him
\q1
5:
because Yahweh always does good things for us.
\q2 He faithfully loves us as he promised us,
\q2 and he is faithful.
